title.en: Prayer to Śāntideva and Dam, Tsang and Jam of Katok

text.en: Throughout all your lives, you took the protector Mañjughoṣa
As the lord of your buddha family, and, for the sake of all,
text.en-trans: rik kyi dakpor tob né dro kün la

text.en: Illuminated the excellent path of a bodhisattva’s way of life—
To Śāntideva, heir of the victorious ones, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: gyalsé zhiwa lha la chaktsal lo

text.en: Katok Dampa,1who was the sole crown-ornament without equal,
text.en-trans: nyammé tsuk gi gyen chik kadampa

text.en: Tsangtönpa,2who reached the level of Universal Illumination,3
text.en-trans: küntu ö kyi sa nyé tsang tönpa

text.en: And glorious Jampa Bum,4who was the omniscient one in person—
text.en-trans: tamché khyen ngö palden jampa bum

text.en: To these three sources of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé jungné sum la solwa deb

text.en: Sönam Bum,5who was a sovereign of all the teachings,
Yeshe Bum,6who reached consummate realization of generation and perfection,
And Jangchub Pal,7who mastered the discipline of reviving the dead—
text.en-trans: sé sö tulzhuk drubpa changchub pal

text.en: To these three beacons of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé drönmé sum la solwa deb
